title: UniCredit boosts its stake in Commerzbank, applies to own up to 29.9% of the German bank
content: UniCredit announced it had increased its stake in German lender Commerzbank to 21% and submitted a request to boost the holding to up to 29.9%.
summary: UniCredit announced it had increased its stake in German lender Commerzbank to 21% and submitted a request to boost the holding to up to 29.9%.

title: A stunning sterling rally is about to collide with Britain's political realities
content: The pound's rally on the back of the Bank of England communication "looks fully justified," Chris Turner, global head of markets at ING, said.
summary: The pound's rally on the back of the Bank of England communication "looks fully justified," Chris Turner, global head of markets at ING, said.

title: Europe careens toward a downturn as its biggest economies fight crises at home
content: With both Germany and France fighting political and economic woes, analysts say there's a danger of a leadership vacuum and more fragmentation.
summary: With both Germany and France fighting political and economic woes, analysts say there's a danger of a leadership vacuum and more fragmentation.

title: Gen Z and millennials are increasingly ‘doom spending.' Here's what it is and how to stop it
content: 'Doom spending' is taking off among young people, as life goals such as owning a home or starting a family feel increasingly out of reach.
summary: 'Doom spending' is taking off among young people, as life goals such as owning a home or starting a family feel increasingly out of reach.

title: Japan is pushing a 4-day working week — but its workaholic culture makes it a hard sell
content: Japan has ramped up its push for companies to adopt a four-day workweek, but those efforts face steep challenges in a country famous for its workaholic culture.
summary: Japan has ramped up its push for companies to adopt a four-day workweek, but those efforts face steep challenges in a country famous for its workaholic culture.

title: These are the 3 patterns of the ‘chronically single,’ says breakup expert

title: China's youth unemployment hits fresh high amid economic slowdown and restrictive hiring policies
content: The jobless rate for people in China ages 16 to 24, and not in school, rose to 18.8% last month. That's up from 17.1% in July, and 13.2% in June.
summary: The jobless rate for people in China ages 16 to 24, and not in school, rose to 18.8% last month. That's up from 17.1% in July, and 13.2% in June.

title: Why EU tariffs are unlikely to dent Chinese EV makers' European expansion
content: To make the European market unattractive for Chinese EV exports, tariffs have to be as high as 50%, according to research group Rhodium.
summary: To make the European market unattractive for Chinese EV exports, tariffs have to be as high as 50%, according to research group Rhodium.

title: Britain's ultra-wealthy are threatening to exit en masse ahead of proposed tax changes
content: Labour's plans to axe the U.K.'s non-dom tax regime could spark an ultra wealthy exodus, advisers and research bodies have warned.

title: American Airlines in talks to pick Citigroup over rival bank Barclays for crucial credit card deal, sources say

title: In U.S. trade war with China, Mexico is emerging as the big winner

title: China unexpectedly leaves benchmark lending rates unchanged after Fed’s jumbo cut
content: The People's Bank of China (PBOC) said it would keep the one-year loan prime rate (LPR) at 3.35%, as well as the five-year LPR at 3.85%.
summary: The People's Bank of China (PBOC) said it would keep the one-year loan prime rate (LPR) at 3.35%, as well as the five-year LPR at 3.85%.

title: Constellation Energy to restart Three Mile Island nuclear plant, sell the power to Microsoft for AI
content: Constellation described the agreement with Microsoft as the largest power purchase agreement that the nuclear plant operator has ever signed.
